#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n%2==1)
            n=n-1;
        int k=n/2;
        if(k%2==1)
        {
            int a=(k-1)*(k+1)/4;
            cout<<a<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<(k*k)/4<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
